com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1

Class D1Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.D1Task

  • public class D1Task
extends Object
    Main class for D1 use cases. It is recommended to initialize D1Task as soon as the application is launched or the earliest possible time.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  D1Task.Builder
      An object that constructs D1Task from its configurations.
      static interface  D1Task.Callback<T>
      Generic callback to return result of an asynchronous call.

    • Method Detail

      • getSDKVersions

        @NonNull
public static Map<String,String> getSDKVersions()
        Returns SDK version(s) in the D1 SDK.
        Returns:
        Dictionary with SDK name as key and SDK version as value, e.g. {"NuDetect": "2.0.0"}

        configParams - configurations

                  byte[] issuerToken,
                  @NonNull

        Login to the D1 services using a provided token.
        Parameters:
        issuerToken - issuer token received from the bank IDP
        callback - callback for the result

                            @NonNull

                            @NonNull
                            CardAsset.MimeEnum mimeType,
                            @NonNull
                            D1Task.Callback<CardMetadata> callback)
        Retrieve basic card metadata.
        Parameters:
        authorizationToken - authorization token
        consumerId - consumer id received from the bank
        cardId - card id received from the bank
        mimeType - mimeType expected from Metadata
        callback - callback for the result

      • updateCard

        public void updateCard(@NonNull
                       String cardId,
                       @NonNull
                       CardAction cardAction,
                       @NonNull
                       String reason,
                       @NonNull
                       D1Task.Callback<Void> callback)
        Update card status which can be used to perform one of the following actions for a given cardId like 1. Activate the card 2. Suspend the card 3. Delete the card
        Parameters:
        cardId - card id received from the bank
        cardAction - card action to be performed: active, suspend or delete
        reason - reason for the operation
        callback - callback for the result
        Since:
        1.0.0
